definition: to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

sentences.english: For the serious fouling components, after first brushing spray, then wash with water.
sentences.chinese: 對積垢嚴重的部件，噴後可先刷除，再用水沖洗。

sentences.english: We need the courage of cleansing the Augean stable to fight against corruption.
sentences.chinese: 我們要以徹底掃清積垢的精神反對腐敗。

sentences.english: We removed the accumulated filth of years from it with a cloth-brush.
sentences.chinese: 我們用抹布擦去了它上面的積垢。
